title: Firefox changes the language from English to Russian on the websites UIs
content:
Hello,

Recently noticed how browser changes the language on restart from English (default language ) to Russian. The affected websites swapped interfaces to Russian language.

Is it part of some kind of A/B testing, locally distributed malware / spyware or just simply embedded ML ops?

I am using macOS.

Thank you, Kind regards, Dmitrii.

title: Resizing windows of/in/on a webpage.  PiHole
content:
I'm not sure what's going on here, but speaking to different people, I hear different stories.

I use FireFox and have PiHole installed on a RasPi. REMOTE ACCESS.

There is a window - to call it - where I can enter any fixed IP addresses.

I can only open it a bit (height wise) but am being told it can open a lot more.

I've tried FireFox and Opera. Both don't allow it to open much more. (So really I don't think it is a Firefox problem)

Anyone have PiHole installed?

Settings/DHCP (expert level) Scroll down to Static DHCP configuration.

The window where you enter addresses.

How "big" can you make i

title: why my gmail inbox no longer is visible
content:
Using Firefox, my gmail inbox is my home page - and has been for several years. As of yesterday, the page opens but the page is blank. I am not aware of any changes that I have made.

I do not have this problem using chrome on the same device or firefox on other devices.

Probably something simple, but I have no idea what.

Thank you
